title: How to Make Your Own Fabric Paints

steps.headline: Get the color of paint that you want in acrylic paints.
steps.description: Whatever you have, or prefer to work with, is fine.

steps.headline: If you have a certain color that isn't available, mix up the colors to get what you want.
Mix in the fabric medium.
steps.description: The mixture needs to be at least 1/3 to 1/2 fabric medium. Not enough will allow the paint to fade quickly and more and the paint gets too runny.

steps.headline: Do 2 to 3 coats of most of your colors.
steps.description: Adjust, depending on the look that you want.

text: Get the color of paint that you want in acrylic paints. Whatever you have, or prefer to work with, is fine. If you have a certain color that isn't available, mix up the colors to get what you want.  Mix in the fabric medium. The mixture needs to be at least 1/3 to 1/2 fabric medium. Not enough will allow the paint to fade quickly and more and the paint gets too runny. Do 2 to 3 coats of most of your colors. Adjust, depending on the look that you want.
